INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As a special education teacher, I am always trying to find ways to build skills that students can use as they become a part of the community. I work with students K-3, and many require repeated exposures to content, strategies, and skills. If I am able to start their exposure to sources that may help them learn, I need to be doing that.

OTHER INTERESTING EXPERIENCE:
Prior to teaching, I worked retail for ten years. I volunteered for three or four years with Enabling Explorers during the summer. I also volunteered to help run Cub Scout meetings.
